articles.title: Meet the millionaires living the ‘underconsumption’ life: They drive secondhand cars, batch cook, and never buy new clothes
articles.mainIdea: Meet the millionaires living the ‘underconsumption’ life: They drive secondhand cars, batch cook, and never buy new clothes
articles.summary: Fortune: Meet the millionaires living the ‘underconsumption’ life: They drive secondhand cars, batch cook, and never buy new clothes. From thrifted clothes to no gifts at the holidays, these millionaires are living an 'underconsumption' life which has opened up financial freedom.

articles.title: Exploring 3 Undervalued Small Caps In Global With Notable Insider Activity
articles.mainIdea: Exploring 3 Undervalued Small Caps In Global With Notable Insider Activity
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Exploring 3 Undervalued Small Caps In Global With Notable Insider Activity. In recent weeks, the global markets have experienced mixed performances, with the Russell 2000 Index declining by 0.86% amid ongoing concerns about tech valuations and economic indicators delivering mixed signals. As small-cap stocks navigate these turbulent waters, investors often look for companies that demonstrate resilience through strong fundamentals and notable insider activity as potential indicators of confidence in their future prospects. Related tickers mentioned: 0450.HK, CVSGF, FSHYF, NOPMF, PGC.AX, PRVFF, VLS.AX.

articles.title: Exploring December 2025's Undervalued European Small Caps With Insider Action
articles.mainIdea: Exploring December 2025's Undervalued European Small Caps With Insider Action
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Exploring December 2025's Undervalued European Small Caps With Insider Action. As the pan-European STOXX Europe 600 Index rises by 1.60%, buoyed by signs of steady economic growth and looser monetary policy, small-cap stocks in Europe are garnering attention amid these favorable conditions. In this environment, identifying promising small-cap stocks involves looking for companies with solid fundamentals that can capitalize on economic stability and potential insider actions that may indicate confidence in their future prospects. Related tickers mentioned: BHG.ST, CVSGF, EAST.ST, FUGRF, GCHHF.
